keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmapAll

############# Navigating the page ############

# Scrolling
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight

map G scrollToBottom
map gg scrollToTop
map H scrollToLeft
map L scrollToRight

map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp

# url
map yy copyCurrentUrl
map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map gu goUp
map gU goToRoot

# mode
map i enterInsertMode
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode

map gi focusInput

# link hint
map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <c-f> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map <c-F> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map yf LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl

#map [[ goPrevious
#map ]] goNext

map gf nextFrame
map gF mainFrame




############# Others #####################
map ? showHelp

# vomnibar
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map ge Vomnibar.activateEditUrl

# find
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

#map <c-h> goBack
#map <c-l> goForward

# tabs
map <c-t> createTab
map <a-h> previousTab
map <a-l> nextTab

map yt duplicateTab
map <c-w> removeTab
map <a-w> restoreTab

map << moveTabLeft
map >> moveTabRight
